plan.name: Example Project Enhancement - Comprehensive API Testing
plan.description: Multi-phase plan to enhance example project to demonstrate and test all package APIs and features

implementationStatus.description: Each phase must have 'implemented' field set to false initially. When phase is complete and tested on device, set to true.
implementationStatus.validation: Before marking implemented: true, ensure all features work on Android and iOS devices/emulators, UI is functional, and all demonstrated APIs are accessible

testing.description: All phases must be tested on real devices or emulators. Manual testing is required.
requirements: Verify all demonstrated features work correctly
Verify UI is intuitive and functional

codeQuality.description: Example code should be clear, well-commented, and demonstrate best practices
requirements: Add comments explaining what each demo shows
Use clear variable and method names

documentation.description: Each demo page should have clear instructions and labels

phases.name: Project Structure and Navigation
phases.description: Set up multi-page navigation structure for the example app
objectives: Create navigation structure for multiple demo pages
Set up home/landing page with navigation
Create reusable widgets for common UI elements

tasks.details: Create directories: pages/, widgets/, utils/ for organization
Create landing page with list of demo pages, navigation to each, and brief descriptions
Change entry point to show HomePage instead of StampDemoPage, set up MaterialApp with navigation
Create reusable widget for feature flag toggles (enableDrag, enableResize, etc.)
Create reusable widget to display stamp information (count, selected, etc.)
Create reusable widget with buttons for controller operations (add, update, remove, etc.)

tests.details: Verify all navigation links work, pages load correctly, back navigation works

tests.description: Test home page displays all demo options
tests.details: Verify home page shows all demo pages with descriptions
Verify feature toggle panel, stamp info panel, and controller controls display properly

acceptanceCriteria: Home page exists with navigation to all demo pages
Reusable widgets are created and functional
Project structure is organized and scalable
All pages are accessible from home page

phases.name: Controller Demo Page
phases.description: Create comprehensive demo page for PdfStampEditorController API

tasks.details: Create page that uses PdfStampEditorController, displays controller state, and provides controls
Show controller with empty list and with initial stamps, display current stamp count
Add buttons to add ImageStamp and TextStamp programmatically via controller.addStamp()
Add button to update first stamp's position/size/rotation via controller.updateStamp()
Add buttons to remove last stamp and clear all stamps via controller methods
Add buttons for selectStamp(), selectStamp(toggle: true), clearSelection(), isSelected() display
Add button for deleteSelectedStamps() method
Add listener to controller, display change log showing when controller notifies listeners
Create UI panel showing: stamp count, selected indices, current stamps list
Create scrollable log showing all controller change notifications with timestamps
Pass controller to PdfStampEditorPage, verify widget responds to controller changes

tests.details: Verify controller can be created empty and with initial stamps, state displays correctly
Click add buttons, verify stamps appear in viewer and state panel, change log updates
Click update button, verify stamp changes in viewer, state panel updates, change log shows event
Click remove/clear buttons, verify stamps disappear, state updates, change log records events
Click select buttons, verify selection state updates, visual feedback shows selected stamps
Select stamps, click delete, verify stamps removed, selection cleared, change log updated
Perform controller operations, verify change log shows all notifications with timestamps
Verify widget updates when controller changes, stamps appear/disappear in viewer
Select/deselect stamps, verify isSelected() returns correct values, UI reflects state

acceptanceCriteria: All controller methods are demonstrated with buttons/controls
Controller state is displayed in real-time
Change log shows all controller notifications
All controller API methods are accessible and testable
UI is intuitive and clearly labeled

phases.name: Features Demo Page
phases.description: Create demo page for feature flags (enableDrag, enableResize, enableRotate, enableSelection)
objectives: Provide clear instructions for each feature

tasks.details: Create page with feature flag toggles and PdfStampEditorPage with configurable features
Add 4 switches for enableDrag, enableResize, enableRotate, enableSelection with labels
Create panel that shows instructions based on which features are enabled
Show visual indicators (icons, colors) for which features are currently enabled
Add buttons for common scenarios: 'Drag Only', 'Resize Only', 'Rotate Only', 'All Features', 'None'
Pass feature flags to PdfStampEditorPage, ensure features enable/disable correctly
Add clear instructions for testing each feature: how to drag, resize, rotate, select

tests.details: Toggle enableDrag, verify drag works when true, disabled when false, instructions update
Toggle enableResize, verify pinch-to-resize works when true, disabled when false
Toggle enableRotate, verify rotation gesture works when true, disabled when false
Toggle enableSelection, verify tap-to-select works when true, disabled when false
Test various combinations: drag+resize, resize+rotate, all enabled, all disabled
Click preset buttons, verify correct features enabled/disabled, instructions update
Toggle features, verify instructions panel updates to show how to use enabled features

acceptanceCriteria: All 4 feature flags have toggle switches
Status indicators show current feature state
Clear instructions for testing each feature

phases.name: Callbacks Demo Page
phases.description: Create demo page demonstrating all callback APIs

tasks.details: Create page that implements all callbacks and logs events
Log when callback fires, display stamp count, show timestamp, increment counter
Log when stamp is selected, display selected index and stamp details, increment counter
Log when stamp is updated, display updated index and what changed, increment counter
Log when stamps are deleted, display deleted indices, increment counter
Log when tap occurs for stamp placement, show timestamp
Log when long press occurs for text stamp placement, show timestamp
Create scrollable list showing all callback events with timestamps, event type, and data
Display counters for each callback type: stampsChanged, selected, updated, deleted, tapDown, longPressDown
Add button to clear callback log and reset statistics
Show details of last selected/updated stamp in a panel

tests.details: Add/remove stamps, verify callback fires, log shows events, counter increments
Select stamps, verify callback fires with correct index and stamp, log shows events
Drag/resize/rotate stamps, verify callback fires, log shows update events with details
Delete stamps, verify callback fires with correct indices, log shows deletion events
Tap to place image stamp, verify callback fires, log shows tap event
Long press to place text stamp, verify callback fires, log shows long press event
Perform rapid actions, verify callbacks fire in correct order, timestamps are accurate
Verify log scrolls, shows all events, clear button works, statistics update correctly

acceptanceCriteria: All 6 callbacks are implemented and functional
Callback log shows all events with timestamps
Stamp details panel shows selected/updated stamp info
Clear log button resets log and statistics

phases.name: Custom Builder Demo Page
phases.description: Create demo page for custom stamp builder functionality

tasks.details: Create page with toggle between default and custom stamp builder
Create custom widget for ImageStamp with custom border, shadow, or styling
Create custom widget for TextStamp with custom font, color, or styling
Add switch to toggle between default and custom builder, show difference
Provide 2-3 different custom builder examples (e.g., bordered, shadowed, animated)
Add dropdown or buttons to select different custom builder styles
Add instructions explaining custom builder usage and when to use it

tests.details: Enable custom builder, place image stamps, verify custom styling appears
Enable custom builder, place text stamps, verify custom styling appears
Toggle between default and custom, verify stamps switch styles correctly
Switch between custom style options, verify each style renders correctly
Verify drag/resize/rotate work with custom builder, custom styling persists

acceptanceCriteria: Toggle between default and custom works
Custom builder works with all interactions

phases.name: Utilities Demo Page
phases.description: Create demo page for coordinate converter and matrix calculator utilities

tasks.details: Create page with PDF viewer and interactive coordinate conversion tools
Show tap position on PDF, convert to PDF coordinates, display result, test with different page rotations
Input PDF coordinates, convert to screen position, show marker on PDF, test round-trip accuracy
Display scale factors for current page, show how they change with zoom, display sx and sy values
Show conversion of PdfPageRotation enum to degrees, test with 0°, 90°, 180°, 270°
Create stamps, calculate transformation matrices, display matrix values, show matrix for different configurations
Add text fields to input PDF coordinates, convert and display screen position
Show current tap position, converted coordinates, and visual markers on PDF
Create widget to display TransformationMatrix values in readable format
Add buttons for common test scenarios: test with rotated pages, test edge coordinates, test round-trip

tests.details: Tap on PDF, verify screen coordinates convert to PDF coordinates correctly, test with rotated pages
Input PDF coordinates, verify conversion to screen position, marker appears at correct location
Convert screen→PDF→screen, verify original and final positions match (within tolerance)
Zoom PDF, verify scale factors update correctly, values are reasonable
Load PDFs with different rotations, verify enum converts to correct degrees
Create stamps with different positions/sizes/rotations, verify matrices calculate correctly
Test coordinates at page edges, zero coordinates, negative coordinates, very large coordinates

acceptanceCriteria: Matrix display is readable and accurate

phases.name: Full Feature Demo Page
phases.description: Create comprehensive demo page with all features enabled and complete workflow
objectives: Demonstrate complete integration of all features
Show complete workflow from placement to export

tasks.details: Create page with all features enabled: controller, all feature flags, all callbacks
Set enableDrag=true, enableResize=true, enableRotate=true, enableSelection=true
Use PdfStampEditorController, connect all controller operations
Implement all 6 callbacks with logging/feedback
Create UI showing workflow steps: Load PDF → Load PNG → Place → Drag → Resize → Rotate → Select → Delete → Export
Include all controls from other pages: feature toggles, controller buttons, export button
Add step-by-step instructions for complete workflow testing
After export, show option to reload exported PDF and verify stamps are embedded

tests.details: Follow workflow: load PDF, load PNG, place stamps, drag, resize, rotate, select, delete, export. Verify each step works
Use drag, resize, rotate, selection simultaneously, verify no conflicts, all work correctly
Use controller operations while features are enabled, verify controller and gestures work together
Perform all actions, verify all callbacks fire correctly, no missing events
After using all features, export PDF, reload exported PDF, verify all stamps are correctly embedded

tests.description: Test edge cases in full feature mode
tests.details: Test with many stamps, multiple pages, rapid interactions, verify performance and stability

acceptanceCriteria: All features work together without conflicts
Controller works with all features enabled
Export produces correct PDF with all stamps

phases.name: Enhanced Basic Demo Page
phases.description: Enhance existing basic demo page with better UI and documentation

tasks.description: Rename current main.dart demo to basic_demo_page.dart
tasks.details: Move current StampDemoPage to pages/basic_demo_page.dart, keep functionality
Add panel explaining what the basic demo shows and how to use it
Add success messages, error handling, better snackbar messages
Show current number of stamps placed
Show export progress, success message with file path, error messages
Add comments explaining what each part demonstrates

tests.details: Verify all original functionality still works, new UI elements display correctly
Verify instructions are clear and helpful
Verify feedback messages appear correctly for all actions

phases.name: Edge Cases and Performance Testing
phases.description: Add testing scenarios for edge cases and performance

tasks.details: Add button to programmatically create 50+ stamps for performance testing
Provide test PDF with multiple pages, test stamps on different pages
Add buttons for: stamps at page edges, overlapping stamps, very large stamps, very small stamps
Display FPS or performance metrics during interactions with many stamps
Add mode that creates many stamps and tests all interactions, verify stability
Provide test PDF with rotated pages, verify all features work with rotated pages

tests.details: Generate 50+ stamps, verify performance is acceptable, all interactions work, no crashes
Place stamps on different pages, verify page navigation works, stamps stay on correct pages
Test edge case scenarios, verify app handles them gracefully, no crashes or errors
Monitor performance with many stamps, verify smooth 60fps, no lag during interactions
Run stress test mode, verify app remains stable, all features continue to work

acceptanceCriteria: Many stamps (50+) can be created and manipulated
Stress tests don't crash the app
